info.name: igdb
info.description:
# IGDB Game API
[IGDB.com](https://www.igdb.com/discover). 

[IGDB: Video Game Database API](https://www.igdb.com/api)

[About â€“ IGDB API docs](https://api-docs.igdb.com/#about)

item.name: A very basic example to retrieve the name for 10 games.
Get all information from a specific game
Count total games that have a rating higher than 75

body.raw: fields name, involved_companies; search "Assassins Creed"; where version_parent = null;

item.name: Get the parent game for a version
Get all games that are playstation 4 exclusives
Get all games that are only released on playstation 4 AND PC
Exclude irrelevant data from your query
Get all games from specific genres

body.raw: fields *; where game.platforms = 48 & date > 1538129354; sort date asc;
fields *; where game.platforms = 48 & date < 1538129354; sort date desc;

        "slug": "icebox",
        "status": 0,
        "storyline": "Sam is the Systems Architect to the Icebox, a digital device designed to subvert the conscious mind. But he always feared the technology may fall into the wrong hands. So he planted covert programs as insurance against any personal incarceration.\n\nOn the eve of final testing, the Blacksuits ambushed Samâ€™s office, stole his invention and kidnapped his only son. They wired the childâ€™s brain to the Icebox in an attempt to decrypt the system. But their attempts failed and the child was soon forgotten, resigned to a protracted hibernation.\n\nAfter years of inactivity, the Icebox was suddenly restartedâ€¦\n\nYou play as Samâ€™s son. Your DNA has triggered an automatic failsafe. You must now search and destroy the Central AI to escape the Icebox before the Blacksuits can take ultimate control.",
        "summary": "The Icebox is a Speedrunning FPS set inside a virtual labyrinth. Use glitch and jet boosts to navigate increasingly challenging environments and sentinels on a mission to search and destroy the Central AI.\n\nChoose how you play the game:\n\nSPEEDRUN MODE\n\n    Race the clock, manage resources, and destroy the sentinels on your way through ever more challenging environments culminating in the final battle against the Central AI. Levels are around 2-5min in length. Completing each level inside the Par Time unlocks the next and posts your score on the Leaderboard. Replay levels to perfect your run and improve your overall score.\n\nCAMPAIGN MODE\n\n    Take a more considered approach through one giant procedural level, saving as often as you like, with no loading screens, on a solitary journey to search and destroy the Central AI. Commencing with a brief tutorial, the campaign walks you through the gameâ€™s mechanics before launching you into progressively harder environments and sentinel battles on your way to the Central AI.\n\nFEATURES\n\n    Two Game Modes - Unlockable Speedruns & Single-Player Campaign\n    Use Glitch - Slow time, bypass gravity, engage shield & boost telekinesis\n    Use Jet Jumps - Navigate the environment using multi-jumps\n    Fight AI Squads - Old school FPS with a few extra twists\n    Hack Terminals - Use terminals to access the network\n    Use Network Gun - Remotely activate network items\n    Find Secret Panels - Search for hidden panels and loot\n    Randomised Worlds - Every play through is unique\n    Top the Leaderboards - Perfect your run and earn the top spot\n    Enjoy Dynamic Music - Reacts to your inputs\n    Make Custom Levels - Design & share your own creations",

        "slug": "the-legend-of-zelda-breath-of-the-wild-the-master-trials",
        "summary": "DLC pack 1 cannot be purchased outside of the expansion pass. This first DLC pack for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the wild doesn't include any story additions but does include new side quests, armour, features and a new trial.\nMaster mode is a new game mode which makes all monsters stronger and gives them regenerating health. You'll also encounter powerful new enemies, and even enemies and treasure chests up in the air.\nThe Trial of the Sword is a new challenge where you start with no equipment, and has to fight through 45 rooms of enemies. Your reward: powering up the Master Sword.\nHero's Path allows you to see the path you've travelled. About 200 hours of gameplay can be tracked.\nTravel medallion is a new item which allows you to register your location as a travel gate on the map.\nThe Korok Mask is Found in a chest. If equipped, it will shake to inform you when a Korok is nearby.\nThere are also eight hidden items for you to find. The following items, which pay tribute to The Legend of Zelda series, can now be found scattered across Hyrule: Majora's Mask, Midna's Helmet, Tingle's Hood, Tingle's Shirt, Tingle's Tights, Phantom Helmet, Phantom Armor and Phantom Greaves.",
